channel.title: Jobs on Michael Aguilar
channel.description: Recent content in Jobs on Michael Aguilar

item.title: AI Doesn't Eliminate Jobs, It Changes Them
item.description:
Introduction

You’ve probably heard the doomsday predictions: “AI will steal all our jobs!” or the flip side, “AI won’t change a thing!” Both miss the mark completely. The real story is far less cinematic but way more interesting.

Summary

AI isn’t here to wipe out jobs—it’s reshaping them by stripping away the soul-crushing busywork, making original thought the new premium currency. Think of it like upgrading from a horse carriage to a Tesla: same destination, radically different ride.
